results.content: Products are mainly used in air purification and water treatment, such as air purifier, beauty care, air conditioning, vacuum cleaner, lamps, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchen bathrooms, drinking water equipment, etc. TRUMPXP fully adopts strict international quality management system for production management and quality control, and has...

Home > Company
Trumpxp uses the technical advantages of its products for many years to develop the air purifier product series, novel functional design, international appearance style, widely loved and praised by customers, become many customers OEM, ODM product preferred solution. In the future, zechang will continue to pay attention to the development of new technology and new products, the improvement of production automation level and the improvement of testing equipment and instruments, and with high-quality management, make products continue to bring forth the new, to meet the needs of different customers.
Trumpxp has a science and technology research and development center for the production of high-quality products laid a solid foundation, large-scale product production lines for products to provide a strong guarantee, bright product exhibition hall for the majority of customers to provide effective reference, perfect equipment unit for the present Zechuang forward to provide inexhaustible power.
Products are mainly used in air purification and water treatment, such as air purifier, beauty care, air conditioning, vacuum cleaner, lamps, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchen bathrooms, drinking water equipment, etc. TRUMPXP fully adopts strict international quality management system for production management and quality control, and has passed IS09001 quality system certification and ISO14001 environmental management system certification. At the same time, it has also obtained CCC, CQC, CE, UL, TUV, SGS, REACH, CB and other certifications at home and abroad. Actively prepare for the adoption of IATF16949 system, so that more and more automotive brands use trumpxp’s automotive air purification solutions.
Trumpxp has developed a series of air purifier products based on its many-year technological advantages. Its novel functional design and internationalized appearance style are widely loved and praised by customers. It has become the best choice of OEM and ODM products for many customers.
In the future,
Trumpxp will continue to attach importance to the development of new technologies and new products, the improvement of production automation level and the improvement of testing equipment and instruments. With high-quality management, Trumpxp will constantly bring forth new products to meet the needs of different customers.
TRUMPXP fresh your tech life

results.title: The Consumer Technology Association Announces CES 2024 Innovation ...
results.content: The Consumer Technology Association (CTA)® today announced its CES® 2024 Innovation Awards honorees - including 36 products recognized as the year's 'Best of Innovation.'. The CES Innovation Awards is an annual competition honoring outstanding design and engineering in consumer technology products across 29 product categories.
results.raw_content:
Popular
The Future of Travel and Hospitality Technology
CTA Foundation
CTA U.S. Consumer Technology One-Year Industry Forecast, 2019-2024 (January 2024)
Focus Fridays
The Consumer Technology Association Announces CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honorees
The Consumer Technology Association (CTA)® today announced itsâ€¯CES® 2024 Innovation Awards honorees – including 36 products recognized as the year’s ‘Best of Innovation.’ The CES Innovation Awards is an annual competition honoring outstanding design and engineering in consumer technology products across 29 product categories. The program was ALL ON for CES 2024, receiving more than 3000 submissions, a record high and a 40% increase over CES 2023.
Each year, an independent panel of industry expert judges, including members of the media, designers and engineers, reviews and rates submissions based on innovation, functionality, aesthetic, and design. Those rated the highest across all categories receive the Best of Innovation designation.
For the CES 2024 program, the top two categories by number of submissions were ‘digital health’ and ‘sustainability, eco-design & smart energy.’ This trend underscores the rapid pace of innovation in sectors that promise to solve big global challenges and improve human lives – a major theme at the show as CTA partners with the UN Trust Fund for Human Security and World Academy of Art and Science (WAAS) to advance human security. For the first time, the Best of Innovation list for CES 2024 includes a product from the ‘Human Security’ category, introduced at CES 2023.
The CES 2024 Innovation Awards also features a new category – artificial intelligence (AI). The AI category received 7% of all applications, underscoring that innovators are increasingly recognizing the transformative potential of AI in shaping the future of technology. AI will also be pervasive throughout the CES 2024 show floor and conference programming.
The full Best of Innovation list and all 522 Innovation Award honorees will be announced during CES 2024, where many of the products will appear in the Innovation Awards Showcase at CES, located in the Venetian Expo.
The Best of Innovation honorees for 2024 include:
AirFarm

Owned and produced by CTA, CES 2024 will take place in Las Vegas on Jan. 9-12, 2024 with Media Days taking place Jan. 7-8, 2024.â€¯Attendees will experience new technologies from global brands, hear about the future of technology from thought leaders and collaborate face-to-face with other attendees. The show will highlight how innovations in sustainability, transportation and mobility, AI, digital health and more are addressing the world’s greatest challenges. Audiences will hear from industry experts during live keynotes, including leaders from L’Oreal, Walmart, Nasdaq, Siemens and Qualcomm.â€¯Visitâ€¯CES.techâ€¯for all CES 2023 updates,â€¯registration details, and theâ€¯media pageâ€¯for all press resources.
About CES:â€¯
CES® is the most powerful tech event in the world – the proving ground for breakthrough technologies and global innovators. This is where the world's biggest brands do business and meet new partners, and the sharpest innovators hit the stage. Owned and produced by the Consumer Technology Association (CTA)®, CES features every aspect of the tech sector. CES 2024 will take place in person in Las Vegas, and digitally, Jan. 9-12, 2024. Learn more atâ€¯CES.techâ€¯and follow CES onâ€¯social.â€¯â€¯
About Consumer Technology Association:â€¯
As North America’s largest technology trade association, CTA®â€¯isâ€¯the tech sector. Our members are the world’s leading innovators – from startups to global brands – helping support more than 18 million American jobs. CTA owns and produces CES® – the most influential tech event in the world. Find us atâ€¯CTA.tech. Follow usâ€¯@CTAtech.â€¯

1419073364
Type Approved
TÜV Rheinland has tested this product to ascertain whether this product complies with the relevant technical and safety requirements. The products tested mainly involve components intended for installation as well as end products which are not yet ready for use.
For each product the internationally valid and applicable standards are checked. In cases where there are no standards or where they are inadequate, an inspection catalogue has been defined which follows the existing standards and which supplements the requirements not already described there. The product is then tested in the lab in accordance with these criteria.
The keyword “Type Approved“ confirms that the product meets the test criteria of TÜV Rheinland.
Safety
TÜV Rheinland has tested this product in order to ascertain the extent to which it is safe in operation and compatible for the user when being used as intended.
TÜV Rheinland has defined a catalogue of tests, which establishes the minimum standards for the safety characteristic according to the product and manufacturer's information.
The test catalogue is based on internationally applicable standards or standards in common use in the industry and exceeds these requirements.
Depending on the product the tests cover electrical and mechanical safety inspections, flammability tests, radiation measurements, etc. The product has been tested in the laboratory according to these criteria. The keyword "Safety" confirms that the product satisfies the established safety criteria.
Regular Production Surveillance
In order to ensure that products initially tested and certified by TÜV Rheinland continue to be produced in consistent quality, the production is inspected at regular intervals. The procedures in the production premises are inspected, such as the purchasing of components (supplier assessment), the individual processing stages and pre-delivery inspections. The use of the keyword "Regular Production Surveillance" confirms that the production has been subjected to such inspections.

results.title: Positive Ion Generator, SPA Ozone, Negative Ion Generator ... - TRUMPXP
results.content: Tianchang TRUMPXP Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. (Tianchang TRUMP Electronic Factory) is located in Tianchang Economic Development Zone, Anhui Province. Founded in the 1980s, the plant covers an area of more than 50,000 square meters and employs more than 300 people.
results.raw_content:
Key words:
Ozone Generator,
O3 generator,
ionizer,
Anion Generator
E-mail:
2880115830@QQ.COM
Home > Company > About us
Tianchang TRUMPXP Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. (Tianchang TRUMP Electronic Factory) is located in Tianchang Economic Development Zone, Anhui Province. Founded in the 1980s, the plant covers an area of more than 50,000 square meters and employs more than 300 people.
It is a professional manufacturer of negative ion generator, plasma generator, ozone generator and accessories, air purifier, beauty instrument, water treatment equipment and so on.
Products are mainly used in air purification and water treatment, such as air purifier, beauty care, air conditioning, vacuum cleaner, lamps, refrigerators, washing machines, kitchen bathrooms, drinking water equipment, etc. TRUMPXP fully adopts strict international quality management system for production management and quality control, and has passed IS09001 quality system certification and ISO14001 environmental management system certification. At the same time, it has also obtained CCC, CQC, CE, UL, TUV, SGS, REACH, CB and other certifications at home and abroad. Actively prepare for the adoption of IATF16949 system, so that more and more automotive brands use trumpxp’s automotive air purification solutions.
Trumpxp has developed a series of air purifier products based on its many-year technological advantages. Its novel functional design and internationalized appearance style are widely loved and praised by customers. It has become the best choice of OEM and ODM products for many customers.
In the future,
Trumpxp will continue to attach importance to the development of new technologies and new products, the improvement of production automation level and the improvement of testing equipment and instruments. With high-quality management, Trumpxp will constantly bring forth new products to meet the needs of different customers.
TRUMPXP fresh your tech life

results.title: Tianchang Trumpxp Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
results.content: Trumpxp walks in front of the times, as far as possible with international standards, provides the service of product design; develop products for client's requirement, uses high quality control system to guarantee stable product quality. We have now approval of I S O 9 0 0 1, I S O 1 4 0 0 1, C E, C Q C, T U V, U L, RoHs, R E A C H certificates.
results.raw_content:
Tianchang Trumpxp Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
Company Size: 101 - 200 People
Address: South of Weiyi Road and West of Jingsi Road, Economic Development Zone, Tianchang City, Chuzhou, Anhui Province, China
Description
"Life, Air, Water, we devote ourselves to environment protection" Trumpxp is dedicated to air and water purifier components. Tianchang Trumpxp Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2016. The factory covers an area of thirty thousand square meters with more than 170 employees. It is specialized in producing accessories such as negative ion generator, plasma ion generator, ozone generator and offering O E M, O D M service. Our products are widely applied in small home appliance (such as hair dryer, hair iron, iron, vacuum cleaner, air purifier), White goods (such as refrigerator, washing machine, air conditioner), Beauty products (such as Facial humidifier, Face washer, Thin face instrument, Portable purifier), and other areas.
Trumpxp walks in front of the times, as far as possible with international standards, provides the service of product design; develop products for client's requirement, uses high quality control system to guarantee stable product quality. We have now approval of I S O 9 0 0 1, I S O 1 4 0 0 1, C E, C Q C, T U V, U L, RoHs, R E A C H certificates.
Trumpxp have rich experience of cooperation of worldwide famous companies, we not only supply good products, but also have good before and after service. We aren't here to sell a few items and move on to the next customer. We want you to be comfortable with our products as well as service.
